original_title: The Bent Bow Must Wait To Be Released
overview: A new work from Sunik Kim, following Zero Chime (First Terrace, 2019), presented in film format. Featuring new music, as well as text from George Jackson, Kim San, Dani√®le Huillet, Xu Lizhi, Rosa Luxemburg, V.I. Lenin, Lee Jae-eui, and many more.
tagline: "...and to your horror it will proclaim with trumpets blazing..."
title: The Bent Bow Must Wait To Be Released
